Message:
I’m inside the mansion,
but snow is falling
from the ceiling...
It’s even starting to
pile up in the hallways...

I slipped and fell
on the frozen floor...
Uuu... If the hallways are
all frozen over...
could this be
Lunalynn’s work again?

At any rate,
there’s still a bit of time
before the Holy Night,
so I should turn everything
back to normal
before someone gets hurt.

...Phew,
I think I’ve cleared most of it.

Huh?
I can hear the faint ringing
of bells from town.
Is it evening already...?!

But the clock here
on the wall says...
Wait, the hands are
frozen and stopped?!
There’s only a little time left
before nightfall...!

I-I-I have to act fast
and find Stella...!

“The power of the miracle
becomes stronger when it snows...”

Ah, there she is!
Heeey! Stella, over here!
